snippet: Mr. Abramson, a successful developer, brought a sense of urgency to the drive in the 1980s to create a United States Holocaust Memorial Museum.
abstract: Albert Abramson, successful developer who was a principal force in the creation of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum, dies at age 94.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Abramson, a successful developer, brought a sense of urgency to the drive in the 1980s to create a United States Holocaust Memorial Museum.

headline.main: Albert Abramson, Holocaust Museum Backer, Is Dead at 94
headline.print_headline: Albert Abramson, 94, Dies; Holocaust Museum Backer
